original_title: Sanasa Life Insurance wins Gold at TAGS 2023 Awards
original_body_lines: Sanasa Life Insurance, a leading insurance service provider in the country, claimed the Gold Award in the category of insurance sector (Gross premium income up to one billion Rupees) at the 58th consecutive TAGS Awards organized by the Institute of Chartered Accountants of Sri Lanka (CA Sri Lanka). The company was honored with the award in recognition of their outstanding performance and commitment to transparency, integrity, governance, and sustainability in corporate reporting. Several prominent organizations representing a wide range of fields participated in the award ceremony which was recently held at Shangri-La Hotel in Colombo, and awards were presented for their annual reports. Sanasa Life Insurance also won the Silver Award for the annual reports of the insurance company sector in 2022.
